title: Arabic 55
text: Busy not thyself with this world, for with fire We test the gold, and with gold We test Our servants.

prev.title: Arabic 54
prev.text: If thine heart be set upon this eternal, imperishable dominion, and this ancient, everlasting life, forsake this mortal and fleeting sovereignty.

next.title: Arabic 56
next.text: Thou dost wish for gold and I desire thy freedom from it. Thou thinkest thyself rich in its possession, and I recognize thy wealth in thy sanctity therefrom. By My life! This is My knowledge, and that is thy fancy; how can My way accord with thine?
